nodes.text: Memories was a roleplaying-game adventure in year two of the Living Force campaign. It was a the third adventure in the Looking In trilogy and was written by Morrie Mullins and Lee Pickler.

The heroes were sent by the Cularin Militia to the Thaereian system, to rescue some prisoners from the Thaereian military on T-4. However, when they got there, most of the prisoners were no longer there and the heroes had to travel to Burnout, where the prisoners were to be fed to an acklay.
